channel.title: I have a Client and Source Need Help!
channel.description: I have created my server and client. I have been hosting with no-ip and it pretty much sucks! I was wondering if anyone could recommend a cheap VPS for a start server? I'd be very appriciative if you could also tell me how to host using vps!

item.title: I have a Client and Source Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @Craxx Craxx
item.description:
@Craxx wrote:

vps.net

VPS Hosting | VPS Servers | VPS.NET
